alert.note: Alert for El Paso (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS El Paso (Southern New Mexico and extreme Western Texas)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 06 at 6:41PM CDT until June 06 at 7:30PM CDT by NWS El Paso
info.description: The National Weather Service in El Paso has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern El Paso County in western Texas... * Until 630 PM MDT. * At 541 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Far East El Paso, moving north at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... East El Paso, Far East El Paso, Horizon City, Homestead Meadows, Montana Vista, Butterfield, Hueco Mountain Estates and Fort Bliss Northeast. This includes Interstate 10 in Texas between mile markers 29 and 32. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
